titleStmt.title: The Churches authority asserted in a sermon preached at Chelmsford, at the metropoliticall visitation of the most Reverend Father in God, VVilliam, Lord Arch-bishop of Canterbury his Grace, &c. March 1. 1636. By Samuel Hoard B.D. and Parson of Morton in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Hoard, Samuel, 1599-1658.

titleStmt.title: The Churches authority asserted in a sermon preached at Chelmsford, at the metropoliticall visitation of the most Reverend Father in God, VVilliam, Lord Arch-bishop of Canterbury his Grace, &c. March 1. 1636. By Samuel Hoard B.D. and Parson of Morton in Essex.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for John Clark, and are to be sold at his shop under S. Peters Church in Cornhill,

notesStmt.note: F3 is a cancel, with verso lines 25-26 having phrase "who dote .. their owne: as". Variant: with cancellandum lacking this phrase.
Reproduction of the original in the Union Theological Seminary (New York, N.Y.). Library.
